abstract: The Pyaterochka and Kopeika grocery chains plan to merge in anticipation of Wal-Mart entering the Russian market.
snippet: The Pyaterochka and Kopeika grocery chains plan to merge in anticipation of Wal-Mart entering the Russian market.
lead_paragraph: Two of Russia’s largest grocery store chains, Pyaterochka and Kopeika, said on Monday that they would merge their operations in a move that would better position them to compete with Wal-Mart, which is expected to enter the Russian market, Andrew E. Kramer reports in The New York Times.

headline.main: 2 Russian Grocers Move to Thwart Wal-Mart
